sentences.english: Men often get fidgety or irritable when they’re supposed to be in two places at once.
sentences.chinese: 男人感到分身乏术时往往会烦躁愤怒。

sentences.english: We cannot be here now…and also be everywhere at once.
sentences.chinese: 此路不通，而且我们同时还分身乏术。

the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

busy and unable to get away
